definition: to hunt/to go hunting (as winter sport in former times)/hunting dog/imperial tour

sentences.english: Hunting without a license will land you in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 无证狩猎将会使你陷入麻烦。

sentences.english: Horseback riding and falconry popular pastimes.
sentences.chinese: 最受人喜爱的消遣是骑马和放鹰狩猎。

sentences.english: My job is to catch people who hunt and fish during the wrong seasons.
sentences.chinese: 我的工作是抓捕那些在错误的时间狩猎和捕鱼的人。

sentences.english: But where are those hunting grounds?
sentences.chinese: 但是狩猎场又在何处呢？

sentences.english: South Africa is the centre of the canned hunting industry.
sentences.chinese: 南非是篱内狩猎产业的中心。

sentences.english: Exactly what kind of hunting group met from so kill things?
sentences.chinese: 到底狩猎团遇到了什么样的事引来如此杀身之祸？

sentences.english: Cubs need to be taught hunting.
sentences.chinese: 小狼崽需要教授狩猎技巧。

sentences.english: The sound hedgehog's picked up is Saw-scale, also on the hunt!
sentences.chinese: 但刺猬听到的声音是同样在狩猎的蝰蛇。

sentences.english: I have been a falconer for 8 years.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个以鹰狩猎者8年。

sentences.english: The pork pie likely originated as a snack for hunting parties.
sentences.chinese: 猪肉馅饼很可能起源于狩猎会上的一道点心。

sentences.english: Tribes of hunter-gatherers have much more freedom.
sentences.chinese: 在狩猎社会，部族里个人的自由更多。

sentences.english: And I think that is part of perhaps where bow hunting comes in.
sentences.chinese: 我想这可能正是弓箭狩猎兴起的原因部分原因所在吧。

sentences.english: Jackals are wolf like hunters that do most of their hunting at night.
sentences.chinese: 豺如狼一般经常在夜间狩猎。

sentences.english: Habitat destruction and hunting are the main threats to the survival of pheasants in this region.
sentences.chinese: 生境破坏与狩猎是该区雉类生存的主要威胁因子。

sentences.english: These things can hunt in the trees as well as on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 这让毒狼不仅能在地面上狩猎还能在树上进退自如。

sentences.english: Alaska Bwana Hunting Knife by Columbia River Knife and Tool.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉斯加布瓦纳狩猎刀哥伦比亚河刀和刀具。

definition: to go on a hunting expedition
to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
to prey on/to catch and feed on/to hunt for food
